Changes
=======

0.2.1 - Oct 15, 2012
--------------------

 * re-released with updated version number

0.2.0 - Sep 17, 2012
--------------------

 * Binary data support in websock.js
 * Target config file/dir and multiple targets with token selector
 * IPv6 fixes
 * SSL target support
 * Proxy to/from unix socket


0.1.0 - May 11, 2012
--------------------

 * Initial versioned release.
